channel.title: Puppet-Common on purpleidea.com
channel.description: Recent content in Puppet-Common on purpleidea.com

item.title: Puppet-Gluster now available as RPM
item.description: I’ve been afraid of RPM and package maintaining [1] for years, but thanks to Kaleb Keithley, I have finally made some RPM’s that weren’t generated from a high level tool. Now that I have the boilerplate done, it’s a relatively painless process! In case you don’t know kkeithley, he is a wizard [2] who happens to also be especially cool and hardworking. If you meet him, be sure to buy him a $BEVERAGE.
